Title: Rambler
Writer: Daniel Keith, Francesco Nuzzi, Colin Filmore, Colin Filmore (story by), Erin E. Clark (psychology consultant writer)
Actors: Daniel Keith, Francesco Nuzzi, Sonja O'Hara, Addison LeMay
Plot: Several Crime Syndicates on London have just discovered they've all hired the same hit man to kill one another. A scarred up punk called, RAMBLER. Now they've put a massive bounty on his head. The streets of London are about to burn.
